title: [K-12] Technology-Enhanced Language Learning Tool Design: An Ethnographic Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-level scientific knowledge and ability to use basic digital tools
context.additional_context: Real-time online collaborative learning conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the ergonomic design of technological tools for language learning.
Learners can evaluate the contextual use of science-domain language learning tools through participatory observation.
Learners can develop strategies for utilizing language learning tools in smartphone-based environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
